traits.name: Charger
traits.detail: If you moved more than 20ft in a straight line towards your target, make your melee attack roll with advantage. On a hit, you knock your target prone in addition to any other effect.

traits.name: (Supporter) Guidance
traits.detail: Allies within 10ft of you have advantage on their attacks rolls.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.detail: The centaur makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Shillelagh
actions.detail: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs AC. _Hit:_ 15 (2d8+6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.detail: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs AC. _Hit:_ 12 (2d6+5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Call Lightning
actions.detail: One creature within 120' must make a [dc-secondary] DEX save or take 27 (6d8) lightning damage.

actions.name: Entangle (3/day)
actions.detail: Each creature in a 20' square must make a [dc-primary] STR save or become restrained (save ends).

actions.name: Healing Word (bonus action)
actions.detail: The centaur grants 15 temporary hit points to itself or another creature within 30' of it.

reactions.name: Not on My Watch
reactions.detail: When a creature that you can see would be reduced to 0 hit points, you can spend your reaction to reduce it to 1 hit point instead. In addition, the creature gains 15 temp hp.
